contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|path|path-|-path}} '''Path''' may refer to: * [[Path (computing)]], in computer file systems, the human-readable address of a resource * [[PATH (variable)]] * [[Path (graph theory)]], a sequence of vertices of a graph * [[Path (social network)]], a photo sharing and messaging service * [[Path (topology)]], a continuous function * [[Path (Ender's Game)|Path (''Ender's Game'')]], a fictional planet * [[Bicycle path]] * [[Bridle path]] * [[Course (navigation)]], the intended path of a vehicle * [[Footpath]] * [[Hiking path]] * [[Sidewalk]] ==See also== * [[PATH (disambiguation)]] * [[The Path (disambiguation)]] * [[Pathway (disambiguation)]] * [[Shining Path]], a Maoist guerrilla insurgent organization * [[Golden Path (Dune)|Golden Path (''Dune'')]], a metaphysical theme from Frank Herbert's ''Dune'' novels * "[[Path Vol.2]]", a 2000 single by Apocalyptica from their album ''Cult'' * [[Clipping path]], a computer image outlining option * [[Control flow]] path, a possible execution sequence in a computer program * The [[st-connectivity]] problem, sometimes known as the "path problem" * [[Footpath (disambiguation)]] * [[Track (disambiguation)]] * [[PathÃ©]] {{disambiguation}}
